records.label: Week of Respect - Franklin School

details.location: Franklin School in North Bergen, NJ

records.desc: The week of 10/7 is the "Week of Respect" in NJ, and Franklin School in North Bergen is looking for a volunteer speaker who can go into classrooms to speak to students grades 4 - 8 about the importance of respect, kindness, friendship, responsibility, or something that inspires them to be mindful of their actions.

records.label: Master the Art of Public Speaking - Bell Works
records.desc: Embark on a transformative journey in our "Mastering the Art of Public Speaking" workshop, featuring voluntary audience interaction with impromptu questions, examples of conststructive criticism. Discover your authentic voice, enhance public speaking skills, and gain a competitive edge. Join us for a concise, impactful session to unlock your full potential in communication and leadership.

records.label: Career Day
records.desc: Gave a total of seven presentations to 4, 5 and 6 grade classes at Indian Hill School during their Career Day to showcase having a job in Software Engineering and Computer Programming.

records.label: Youth Leadership Program - Guest
records.desc: Gave a presentation about impromptu speaking for the Youth Leadership Program.
